TEXT.French: Diplomatie
Paramètres de Diplomatie Standard:
Paramètres de Diplomatie Avancée:
Peut échanger les Techs

TEXT.English: Players Can Trade Technologies to other players.
TEXT.French: Les Joueurs peuvent s'échanger des Technologies.
TEXT.German: Players Can Trade Technologies to other players.
TEXT.Italian: Players Can Trade Technologies to other players.
TEXT.Spanish: Players Can Trade Technologies to other players.
TEXT.Finnish: Players Can Trade Technologies to other players.

TEXT.French: Peut monnayer les Techs

TEXT.English: Players Can Broker Technologies to other players.
TEXT.French: Les Joueurs peuvent utiliser les Technologies comme monnaie d'échange.
TEXT.German: Players Can Broker Technologies to other players.
TEXT.Italian: Players Can Broker Technologies to other players.
TEXT.Spanish: Players Can Broker Technologies to other players.
TEXT.Finnish: Players Can Broker Technologies to other players.

TEXT.French: Peut échanger les Ressources

TEXT.English: Players Can Trade Resources to other players.
TEXT.French: Les Joueurs peuvent s'échange des Ressources.
TEXT.German: Players Can Trade Resources to other players.
TEXT.Italian: Players Can Trade Resources to other players.
TEXT.Spanish: Players Can Trade Resources to other players.
TEXT.Finnish: Players Can Trade Resources to other players.

TEXT.French: Peut échanger des Villes

TEXT.English: Players Can Trade Cities to other players.
TEXT.French: Les Joueurs peuvent échanger des Villes avec les autres joueurs.
TEXT.German: Players Can Trade Cities to other players.
TEXT.Italian: Players Can Trade Cities to other players.
TEXT.Spanish: Players Can Trade Cities to other players.
TEXT.Finnish: Players Can Trade Cities to other players.

TEXT.French: Peut échanger les Ouvriers

TEXT.English: Players Can Trade Workers to other players.
TEXT.French: Les Joueurs peuvent échanger des Ouvriers avec les autres joueurs.
TEXT.German: Players Can Trade Workers to other players.
TEXT.Italian: Players Can Trade Workers to other players.
TEXT.Spanish: Players Can Trade Workers to other players.
TEXT.Finnish: Players Can Trade Workers to other players.

TEXT.French: Peut échanger des unités militaires

TEXT.English: Players Can Trade Military Units to other players.
TEXT.French: Les Joueurs peuvent échanger des unités militaires avec les autres joueurs.
TEXT.German: Players Can Trade Military Units to other players.
TEXT.Italian: Players Can Trade Military Units to other players.
TEXT.Spanish: Players Can Trade Military Units to other players.
TEXT.Finnish: Players Can Trade Military Units to other players.

TEXT.French: Peut échanger de l'Or

TEXT.English: Players Can Trade Gold to other players.
TEXT.French: Les Joueurs peuvent utiliser l'Or pour les échanges avec les autres joueurs.
TEXT.German: Players Can Trade Gold to other players.
TEXT.Italian: Players Can Trade Gold to other players.
TEXT.Spanish: Players Can Trade Gold to other players.
TEXT.Finnish: Players Can Trade Gold to other players.

TEXT.French: Peut échanger de l'Or par Tour

TEXT.English: Players Can Trade Gold Per Turn to other players.
TEXT.French: Les Joueurs peuvent utiliser l'Or par tour pour les échanges avec les autres joueurs.
TEXT.German: Players Can Trade Gold Per Turn to other players.
TEXT.Italian: Players Can Trade Gold Per Turn to other players.
TEXT.Spanish: Players Can Trade Gold Per Turn to other players.
TEXT.Finnish: Players Can Trade Gold Per Turn to other players.

TEXT.French: Peut échanger les cartes

TEXT.English: Players Can Trade Maps to other players.
TEXT.French: Les Joueurs peuvent échanger des cartes avec les autres joueurs.
TEXT.German: Players Can Trade Maps to other players.
TEXT.Italian: Players Can Trade Maps to other players.
TEXT.Spanish: Players Can Trade Maps to other players.
TEXT.Finnish: Players Can Trade Maps to other players.

TEXT.French: Peut échanger Vassal
Les Joueurs peuvent demander la Vassalité.
Peut établir des embassades

TEXT.English: Players Can Establish Embassies in foreign nations.
TEXT.French: Les Joueurs peuvent établir des Embassades aupèrs des nations étrangères.
TEXT.German: Players Can Establish Embassies in foreign nations.
TEXT.Italian: Players Can Establish Embassies in foreign nations.
TEXT.Spanish: Players Can Establish Embassies in foreign nations.
TEXT.Finnish: Players Can Establish Embassies in foreign nations.

TEXT.French: Peut échanger les Contacts

TEXT.English: Players Can Trade Contacts to foreign nations.
TEXT.French: Les Joueurs peuvent échanger le contact avec les autres nations étrangères.
TEXT.German: Players Can Trade Contacts to foreign nations.
TEXT.Italian: Players Can Trade Contacts to foreign nations.
TEXT.Spanish: Players Can Trade Contacts to foreign nations.
TEXT.Finnish: Players Can Trade Contacts to foreign nations.

TEXT.French: Peut échanger des sièges de Corporation

TEXT.English: Players Can Trade Corporation HQ's to foreign nations.
TEXT.French: Les Joueurs peuvent s'échanger les sièges de leur corporation.
TEXT.German: Players Can Trade Corporation HQ's to foreign nations.
TEXT.Italian: Players Can Trade Corporation HQ's to foreign nations.
TEXT.Spanish: Players Can Trade Corporation HQ's to foreign nations.
TEXT.Finnish: Players Can Trade Corporation HQ's to foreign nations.

TEXT.French: Peut demander la Paix

TEXT.English: Players Can convince foreign countries to end wars
TEXT.French: Les Joueurs peuvent convaincre de mettre fin à une guerre
TEXT.German: Players Can convince foreign countries to end wars
TEXT.Italian: Players Can convince foreign countries to end wars
TEXT.Spanish: Players Can convince foreign countries to end wars
TEXT.Finnish: Players Can convince foreign countries to end wars

TEXT.French: Peut demander la Guerre

TEXT.English: Players Can convince foreign countries to begin wars against other countries
TEXT.French: Les Joueurs peuvent convaincre de commencer une guerre contre d'autres nations
TEXT.German: Players Can convince foreign countries to begin wars against other countries
TEXT.Italian: Players Can convince foreign countries to begin wars against other countries
TEXT.Spanish: Players Can convince foreign countries to begin wars against other countries
TEXT.Finnish: Players Can convince foreign countries to begin wars against other countries

TEXT.French: Peut demander des Embargos

TEXT.English: Players Can convince foreign countries to establish a trade embargo against other countries
TEXT.French: Les Joueurs peuvent convaincre de mettre en place des embargos contre d'autres nations
TEXT.German: Players Can convince foreign countries to establish a trade embargo against other countries
TEXT.Italian: Players Can convince foreign countries to establish a trade embargo against other countries
TEXT.Spanish: Players Can convince foreign countries to establish a trade embargo against other countries
TEXT.Finnish: Players Can convince foreign countries to establish a trade embargo against other countries

TEXT.French: Peut demander des Embargos

TEXT.English: Players Can convince foreign countries to establish a trade embargo against other countries
TEXT.French: Les Joueurs peuvent convaincre de mettre en place des embargos contre d'autres nations
TEXT.German: Players Can convince foreign countries to establish a trade embargo against other countries
TEXT.Italian: Players Can convince foreign countries to establish a trade embargo against other countries
TEXT.Spanish: Players Can convince foreign countries to establish a trade embargo against other countries
TEXT.Finnish: Players Can convince foreign countries to establish a trade embargo against other countries

TEXT.French: Peut demander des Doctrines

TEXT.English: Players Can convince foreign countries to switch civics
TEXT.French: Les Joueurs peuvent convaincre de changer de Doctrines
TEXT.German: Players Can convince foreign countries to switch civics
TEXT.Italian: Players Can convince foreign countries to switch civics
TEXT.Spanish: Players Can convince foreign countries to switch civics
TEXT.Finnish: Players Can convince foreign countries to switch civics

TEXT.French: Peut demander Religion

TEXT.English: Players Can convince foreign countries to switch religions
TEXT.French: PLes Joueurs peuvent convaincre de changer de religion
TEXT.German: Players Can convince foreign countries to switch religions
TEXT.Italian: Players Can convince foreign countries to switch religions
TEXT.Spanish: Players Can convince foreign countries to switch religions
TEXT.Finnish: Players Can convince foreign countries to switch religions

TEXT.French: Peut établir un libre Passage

TEXT.English: Players Can Establish Open Borders with other nations
TEXT.French: Les Joueurs peuvent établir un libre passage avec les autres nations
TEXT.German: Players Can Establish Open Borders with other nations
TEXT.Italian: Players Can Establish Open Borders with other nations
TEXT.Spanish: Players Can Establish Open Borders with other nations
TEXT.Finnish: Players Can Establish Open Borders with other nations

TEXT.French: Peut établir un Droit de Passage

TEXT.English: Players Can Establish Right of Passage with other nations
TEXT.French: Les Joueurs peuvent établir un Droit de passage avec les autres nations
TEXT.German: Players Can Establish Right of Passage with other nations
TEXT.Italian: Players Can Establish Right of Passage with other nations
TEXT.Spanish: Players Can Establish Right of Passage with other nations
TEXT.Finnish: Players Can Establish Right of Passage with other nations

TEXT.French: Peut établir un Pacte de défense

TEXT.English: Players Can Establish Defensive Pact with other nations
TEXT.French: Les Joueurs peuvent établir un Pacte de défense avec les autres nations
TEXT.German: Players Can Establish Defensive Pact with other nations
TEXT.Italian: Players Can Establish Defensive Pact with other nations
TEXT.Spanish: Players Can Establish Defensive Pact with other nations
TEXT.Finnish: Players Can Establish Defensive Pact with other nations

TEXT.French: Peut établir une Alliance

TEXT.English: Players Can Establish an Alliance with other nations
TEXT.French: Les Joueurs peuvent établir une Alliance avec les autres nations
TEXT.German: Players Can Establish an Alliance with other nations
TEXT.Italian: Players Can Establish an Alliance with other nations
TEXT.Spanish: Players Can Establish an Alliance with other nations
TEXT.Finnish: Players Can Establish an Alliance with other nations

TEXT.French: Diplomatie Avancée

TEXT.English: Enables or Disables the Advanced Diplomacy Gameoption, which allows embassies, right of passages, worker and military unit trading, and a more diplomacy options.
TEXT.French: Active ou désactive l'option Diplomatie avancée, qui permet les ambassades, droits de passage, l'échange d'unité militaire et ouvrières, ...
TEXT.German: Enables or Disables the Advanced Diplomacy Gameoption, which allows embassies, right of passages, worker and military unit trading, and a more diplomacy options.
TEXT.Italian: Enables or Disables the Advanced Diplomacy Gameoption, which allows embassies, right of passages, worker and military unit trading, and a more diplomacy options.
TEXT.Spanish: Enables or Disables the Advanced Diplomacy Gameoption, which allows embassies, right of passages, worker and military unit trading, and a more diplomacy options.
TEXT.Finnish: Enables or Disables the Advanced Diplomacy Gameoption, which allows embassies, right of passages, worker and military unit trading, and a more diplomacy options.
